answers.answer: Hi,How are you? I'm sorry to hear about the foot  accident. I understand your concern regarding the burn and it is important that you take the medications as prescribed and go for follow-up consultation with your attending physician. Healing time may also be affected by presence of co-morbid conditions like diabetes. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: i spilled hot oil on top of foot dec 22. went 2 different ers within 2wks of burn.i finally got referral for burn unit. (my foot swelled up to mid calf ) the drs & rns are some of the most wonderful special people! the pain is horrid but must be done. i understood that only after the first treatment,oh my gosh the things that flew from my mouth, i did'nt think ever used these together at one time. but still unable to put shoe on and burn seems to keep appearing differently. i never knew PAIN untill this. and i am 62.
title: 2 and 3rd degree on foot
